entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@realDonaldTrump @EricTrump This week, in only 24 hours, we had the biggest number of dead people in America ever since the coronavirus breakout. We have a great chance of even more dead people today. 

The really big bounce will happen when the visible enemy in the WH is gone!

#CoronaDon
#MAGAkills
